title: Truffle debug fails when contracts have no storage variables
body:
## Issue

Receiving `TypeError: Cannot read property 'id' of undefined` whenever truffle `debug` is used with `ganache-cli`

NB: the string 'id' does not appear anywhere in my `.sol` contract or `.js` unit test that produced the transaction.

## Steps to Reproduce

```
truffle debug 0xa1e863b7859a74ab256060bcba215f8669f57fc932c00971b44450000160c387
```

## Actual Results

```
Gathering transaction data...

TypeError: Cannot read property 'id' of undefined
    at newScope.variables.concat.filter.variable (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-debugger/dist/debugger.js:1738:1)
    at Array.filter (<anonymous>)
    at map (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-debugger/dist/debugger.js:1735:1)
    at Array.map (<anonymous>)
    at data.info.scopes._ (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-debugger/dist/debugger.js:1720:125)
    at /Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:76:1
    at /Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:36:1
    at /Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:90:1
    at Function._ (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:36:1)
    at args (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect-tree/index.js:209:1)
    at /Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:86:1
    at Function._ (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:36:1)
    at args (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect-tree/index.js:209:1)
    at /Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:86:1
    at /Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:36:1
    at runSelectEffect (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/redux-saga-core.esm.js:723:1)
    at runEffect (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/redux-saga-core.esm.js:1191:1)
    at digestEffect (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/redux-saga-core.esm.js:1258:1)
    at next (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/redux-saga-core.esm.js:1148:1)
    at currCb (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/redux-saga-core.esm.js:1238:1)
    at checkEnd (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/chunk-585b854f.js:154:1)
    at chCbAtKey (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/chunk-585b854f.js:170:1)
    at Object.currCb [as cont] (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/redux-saga-core.esm.js:1238:1)
    at end (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/redux-saga-core.esm.js:1001:1)
    at Object.task.cont (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/redux-saga-core.esm.js:829:1)
    at next (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/redux-saga-core.esm.js:1157:1)
    at Object.currCb [as cont] (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/redux-saga-core.esm.js:1238:1)
    at end (/Users/isaacsultan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.14.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/@redux-saga/core/dist/redux-saga-core.esm.js:1001:1)
The above error occurred in task session.saga
Tasks cancelled due to error:
controller.saga
data.saga
evm.saga
solidity.saga
trace.saga
web3.saga
```

## Environment

* Operating System: macOS
* Ethereum client: ganache0-cli
* Truffle version: Truffle v5.0.0 
* node version: v8.9.3
* npm version: 6.5.0
@haltman-at is this error message one that you are familiar with?
It is not!  Thanks for pointing this out, I'll have to take a look.  This certainly looks like a debugger issue rather than a ganache-cli issue.
I'll probably need more reproduction info to figure out what's going on, I should note.  Just looking through the code, I don't know why this would happen.
@isaacsultan 	This error message is coming from `truffle`, so I'll move the issue to that repo so it can be properly triaged there.

Could you try upgrading to the latest version of Truffle?
```
npm uninstall -g truffle
npm install -g truffle@5.0.5
```

Note that you will also need to upgrade to Node v8.9.4 or later.

Please let us know if the problem still occurs!

Thanks @gnidan Having upgraded to truffle v5.0.5 and latest version of ganache-cli, the problem still persists!

I was having the same issue, but on Ubuntu 16.04. The thing that solved it for me was downgrading truffle to 5.0.3 (5.0.4 and 5.0.5 both appeared to have this problem)
Env:
Ganache CLI v6.3.0 (ganache-core: 2.4.0)
Node v11.9.0
npm 6.8.0
Can anyone provide full reproduction steps? Thanks!

Hi @gnidan, I've pushed up a simple repo that displays this issue: 

https://github.com/isaacsultan/workshop/

Steps:

```
npm i
ganache-cli
truffle test
truffle debug [LAST-TRANSACTION]
```

Having similar problem in all versions: 5.0.0 5.0.1 5.0.2 5.0.3 5.0.4 and 5.0.5
```
truffle version
Truffle v5.0.5 (core: 5.0.5)
Solidity v0.5.0 (solc-js)
Node v11.10.0
```

Don't know if this is important. Let me know if you need my repository.
Thanks @isaacsultan!  With your example I was able to quickly isolate the problem and I have created PR #1779 to fix it.
Thank you @haltman-at, super glad that I could be of help!

Web3.js v1.2.1
Hm, the same thing?  Could you post the error message for certainty here?  Also, do you perhaps have a reproduction example we could check out?

@passabilities That appears to be a different error, but we can group them together, I suppose.  Do you have a reproduction example I could try out?

Ahh ok I think the solution was to delete the build folder and recompile before running your tests:

```
rm -rf bulid 
truffle compile
truffle test
truffle debug 0x
```

That did the trick for me

I still have this probem on

* Truffle v5.1.22 (core: 5.1.22)
* Node v10.19.0

Ran this sequence:

```
$ rm -rf build
$ truffle compile
$ truffle test
```

@xlab That looks like a different problem to me; it just happens to have the same top line of the error message.  Unfortunately, people seem to have posted a number of different issues under this issue, simply because they involve trying to read the `id` of `undefined`.

Perhaps we could move discussion of your issue to #2977 instead?

@akrolak we're closing this for issue maintenance, esp. since it seems like this issue is being used as a catch-all for a number of different problems. If your problem still persists, we'd love to get to the bottom of it. Let us know and we'll reopen.

Everyone else: if you have a different issue, please open a new issue for it! Thank you all!
